card.name: ·The One Ring, The Ring of Doom
card.text: While wearing The One Ring, the Ring-bearer gains hunter 3, and each time he or she is about to take a wound in a skirmish, add a burden instead. Skirmish: Add a burden to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·The One Ring, The Ruling Ring
card.text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.name: Chamber of Records
card.text: When you play this, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 {Dwarven} tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this from play or remove a {Dwarven} token from here to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a {Dwarven} card, take it into your hand, otherwise, place it in your discard pile.

card.name: The Fortunes of Balin's Folk
card.text: Exert a Dwarf to shuffle a {Dwarven} condition with one or more {Dwarven} tokens on it into your draw deck. Wound a minion for each {Dwarven} token that was on that condition.

card.name: ·Gimli, Eager Hunter
card.text: Damage +1. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.)

card.name: ·Gloin, Son of Groin
card.text: Each time Gloin wins a skirmish, you may draw 3 cards, then place 3 cards from your hand beneath your draw deck in any order. Skirmish: Remove a {Dwarven} token to make Gloin strength +2.

card.name: Heavy Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. This is twilight cost -1 for each {Dwarven} card that has a culture token on it. Skirmish: Remove a {Dwarven} token to make bearer strength +1.

card.name: Sturdy Stock
card.text: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or if you can spot a hunter minion, strength +1 and damage +1 for each hunter minion you can spot).

card.name: Well-crafted Armor
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time bearer takes a wound, you may reinforce a {Dwarven} token. Skirmish: Discard a {Dwarven} card from hand to make bearer damage +1.

card.name: Whatever End
card.text: Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter {Gondor} companion or hunter {Elven} companion damage +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Dwarven} companion strength +2.

card.name: ·Arwen, She-Elf
card.text: While you can spot Aragorn, Arwen is strength +1 and resistance +2. Skirmish: Remove an {Elven} token to make a minion skirmishing Arwen strength -2.

card.name: ·Dinendal, Mirkwood Archer
card.text: Aid - {3}. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add {3} to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, except an {Elven} companion, exert bearer. Bearer is an archer.

card.name: Elven Bow
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.name: Elven Warrior
card.text: While this companion is bearing a possession, he is strength +2. Maneuver: Exert this companion to place an {Elven} card from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: Focus
card.text: Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may heal a hunter {Dwarven} Dwarf or hunter {Gondor} Man. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an {Elven} Elf strength +2.

card.name: ·Gift of the Evenstar, Blessed Light
card.text: Each time an Elf wins a skirmish, you may exert that Elf or Aragorn to place an {Elven} token here. At the start of each maneuver phase, you may remove an {Elven} token here to draw a card.

card.name: ·Haldir, Sentry of the Golden Wood
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While the fellowship is at a battleground site, Haldir is strength +2. While the fellowship is at a forest site, Haldir is an archer.

card.name: ·Legolas, Fleet-footed Hunter
card.text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Regroup: Exert 2 hunter companions to draw a card.

card.name: ·Legolas, of the Woodland Realm
card.text: Archer. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Archery: Exert Legolas to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each hunter minion you can spot. (limit +3)

card.name: Lorien's Blessing
card.text: Spot an {Elven} follower to make the minion archery total -3.

card.name: Mighty Shot
card.text: Spot an Elf to make the fellowship archery total +1 for each minion with twilight cost 2 or less that you can spot.

card.name: ·The Mirror of Galadriel, Dangerous Guide
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. Each time you are about to draw a card, you may exert an Elf to look at the top three cards of your draw deck instead. Take a Free Peoples card into your hand and place the other cards on the bottom of your draw deck.

card.name: Point Blank Range
card.text: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if you can spot 3 archers).

card.name: Spied From Afar
card.text: To play, spot 3 Elves. While you can spot an {Elven} follower, the twilight cost of each Shadow possession is +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an {Elven} companion strength +1 for each archer companion you can spot.

card.name: Sword of the Fallen
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. Each minion skirmishing bearer is strength -1 for each wound on that minion. Skirmish: Exert bearer to exert a minion skirmishing bearer.

card.name: ·Uruviel, Woodland Maid
card.text: Aid - {1}. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add{1} to transfer this to a companion.) Each time you transfer this to a companion, you may exert an Elf to make the fellowship’s current site a forest until the end of the turn.

card.name: Be Gone!
card.text: Spell. Exert your {Gandalf} companion X times to make a minion strength -2 until the regroup phase, for each time that {Gandalf} companion exerted.

card.name: Ent Avenger
card.text: While you can spot 3 Ents, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Powerful Guide
card.text: To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Each time you play a spell, you may add a burden to wound a minion. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, you may draw a card and then discard a card from your hand.

card.name: ·Leaflock, Finglas
card.text: Leaflock’s twilight cost is -1 for each Ent you can spot. While you can spot 4 other Ents, Leaflock is strength +4.

card.name: ·Mellon!
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Gandalf} companions. At the start of the maneuver phase, discard this condition to make each player count the number of cards in his or her hand, discard each of them and draw the same number of cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Momentous Gathering
card.text: Choose one: spot an Ent to take a {Gandalf} companion into hand from your draw deck; or spot 2 Ents to take a {Gandalf} companion and a {Gandalf} condition into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: One Last Surprise
card.text: Spell. Spot Gandalf and an unbound companion skirmishing a minion to use Gandalf’s resistance to resolve that skirmish instead of that companion’s strength.

card.name: ·Quickbeam, Hastiest of All Ents
card.text: Quickbeam is twilight cost -1 for each Ent you can spot. Maneuver: Discard this companion to place another {Gandalf} companion from your discard pile on the bottom of your draw deck and reinforce a {Gandalf} token.

card.name: Shadow of the Wood
card.text: This companion is twilight cost -1 for each {Gandalf} companion you can spot. Fellowship: Place this companion in the dead pile to remove {5}.

card.name: Shepherd of the Trees
card.text: While you can spot 4 Ents, this companion is strength +3. Maneuver: Exert this companion to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a {Gandalf} character, you may play it.

card.name: ·Skinbark, Elder Ent
card.text: Skinbark is twilight cost -1 for each {Gandalf} condition you can spot. Each time Skinbark wins a skirmish, you may place a {Gandalf} card from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.name: ·Treebeard, Enraged Shepherd
card.text: To play, spot 3 {Gandalf} companions. Each time Treebeard wins a skirmish, the first Shadow player must exert X minions, where X is the difference between Treebeard’s strength and the losing character’s strength.

card.name: Called to Mordor
card.text: Bearer must be Sméagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each time an opponent uses a skirmish special ability in a skirmish involving Gollum or Sméagol, you may wound a minion.

card.name: ·Connected by Fate
card.text: To play, spot Sméagol. While you can spot 2 Ring-bound Hobbits, each Shadow event is twilight cost +1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make each Ring-bound companion strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Controlled by the Ring
card.text: Bearer must be Gollum. Skirmish: If Gollum is not assigned to a skirmish, discard this condition to have him replace a minion skirmishing a companion.

card.name: Desperate Move
card.text: Discard a {Gollum} minion from play to discard a companion. The Free Peoples player may make the move limit -1 this turn to prevent that.

card.name: ·Gollum, Hopeless
card.text: At the start of each skirmish involving Gollum, he is strength +X until the end of that skirmish, where X is the Ring-bearer’s strength.

card.name: Herbs and Stewed Rabbit
card.text: While you can spot Frodo, Sméagol is resistance +1. While you can spot Sam, Sméagol is strength +1. While you can spot Bilbo, Sméagol is damage +1.

card.name: Hurry Hobbitses
card.text: Make Sméagol strength +1 for each Ring-bound Hobbit you can spot.

card.name: Nice Fish
card.text: Each time Sméagol wins a skirmish, place a {Gollum} token here. Regroup: Heal a Ring-bound companion for each token here. Discard this condition.

card.name: Not This Time!
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Gollum and remove a threat to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing.

card.name: Release Them
card.text: Spot Sméagol to prevent a Ring-bound Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled. While this card is in your discard pile, Sméagol is resistance +1.

card.name: ·Sméagol, Wretched and Hungry
card.text: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Each Ring-bound companion is resistance +1. Skirmish: Exert 2 Ring-bound Hobbits to make Sméagol strength +1 and prevent him from being overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: Something Slimy
card.text: Spot Sméagol to play a Free Peoples condition from your draw deck. If that condition was a {Gollum} condition, you may make an opponent place a random card from his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Sudden Strike
card.text: Spot Gollum or Sméagol to play a minion from your draw deck. If that minion is a {Gollum} minion, you may also play a Shadow possession or Shadow condition from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Swear By the Precious
card.text: Spot Frodo and Sméagol to discard a minion. That minion’s owner may make each minion strength -2 until the end of the turn to prevent that.

card.name: Unseen Foe
card.text: Discard a {Gollum} minion from play to wound each companion with strength 8 or more.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Swift Hunter
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make a hunter companion strength +1.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Thorongil
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) Maneuver: Add a threat to exert a non-hunter minion with strength less than Aragorn's.

card.name: ·Aragorn's Bow, Ranger's Longbow
card.text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Add a threat to wound a minion with the lowest strength.

card.name: ·Damrod, Dunadan of Gondor
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each fellowship phase, you may add {1} to heal a ranger.

card.name: ·Decorated Barricade
card.text: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each {Gondor} ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert 2 {Gondor} Men to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man.

card.name: Dunedain of the South
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may make a {Gondor} ranger strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Forth the Three Hunters!
card.text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

card.name: Forth the Three Hunters!
card.text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

card.name: Forth the Three Hunters!
card.text: Archery: Exert Legolas and exert Aragorn to wound a minion. Skirmish: Exert Aragorn and spot Gimli to make a minion strength -1 (or -3 if Aragorn and Gimli are hunters). Regroup: Exert Gimli and spot Legolas to draw a card (or 2 cards if Gimli and Legolas are hunters).

card.name: Gondorian Prowler
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. When this companion is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Remove a {Gondor} token or exert a {Gondor} Man to make the site number of a minion +2.

card.name: Ithilien Blade
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. While you can spot a roaming minion, bearer is strength +1. Maneuver: Exert bearer twice to discard a roaming minion.

card.name: ·Mablung, Ranger of Ithilien
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Skirmish: Exert Mablung to wound a roaming minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Madril, Defender of Osgiliath
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. While you can spot 2 {Gondor} rangers, Madril is twilight cost -2. At the start of the maneuver phase, each minion is site number +1 for each threat you can spot until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: No Quicker Path
card.text: Each time Aragorn wins a skirmish, you may make a hunter {Dwarven} companion or hunter {Elven} companion strength +1 until the regroup phase. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a {Gondor} Man strength +2.

card.name: No Travellers In This Land
card.text: Exert a {Gondor} Man to wound a minion (or wound that minion twice if it is a hunter).

card.name: Portico
card.text: Fortification. This condition is twilight cost -1 for each {Gondor} ranger you spot. Skirmish: Exert a {Gondor} Man or spot 2 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man.

card.name: Ranger's Cloak
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. While bearer is a ranger or at a forest site, each minion skirmishing bearer is site number +2. Skirmish: Add a threat or exert bearer to make a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man site number +2.

card.name: Silent Traveler
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) At the start of each skirmish involving this companion and a roaming minion, you may reinforce a {Gondor} token.

card.name: ·Tremendous Wall
card.text: Fortification. Characters skirmishing bearer cannot take wounds from losing a skirmish involving bearer. Skirmish: Exert a {Gondor} Man or spot 3 rangers to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a {Gondor} Man.

card.name: Unyielding Ranger
card.text: Ranger. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This companion is strength +1 for each roaming minion you can spot.

card.name: ·Bill Ferny, Agent of Saruman
card.text: If Bill Ferny is unwounded, the Free Peoples player cannot assign him to skirmish a companion. Shadow: Exert Bill Ferny twice and spot a site you control to add {2}.

card.name: Bold Easterling
card.text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a {Men} minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Chieftain of Dunland
card.text: Fierce. Skirmish: Spot a site you control and remove {2} to make a {Men} Man strength +2. Skirmish: Spot 2 sites you control and remove {2} to make a {Men} Man strength +3. Skirmish: Spot 3 sites you control and remove {2} to make a {Men} Man strength +4.

card.name: Courageous Easterling
card.text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a {Men} minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Destroyed Homestead
card.text: When you play this, spot 2 {Men} Men to randomly reveal a site from the Free Peoples player’s adventure deck. Note its cardtitle. Each site on the adventure path with the same card title as the selected site loses its gametext.

card.name: Easterling Scout
card.text: Skirmish: If this minion is skirmishing, discard this minion to play a {Men} minion from your discard pile. That minion is fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Engrossed Hillman
card.text: At the start of the maneuver phase, if you can spot another {Men} Man and 8 characters (or if you can spot 3 Free Peoples cultures), you may take control of a site.

card.name: Enraged Herdsman
card.text: While you can spot more companions than minions, each {Men} hunter is strength +2 and is an archer.

card.name: Great Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Men} Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter companion, bearer is strength +2.

card.name: Grieving the Fallen
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} Man. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Bearer cannot take wounds during the archery phase. At the start of the regroup phase, discard this condition.

card.name: Grousing Hillman
card.text: While you control a site, this minion is strength +3 and fierce.

card.name: Hunting Herdsman
card.text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) This minion is strength +3 for each follower you can spot.

card.name: Last Gasp
card.text: Wound 3 {Men} archers to exhaust a companion.

card.name: Lying Counsel
card.text: Exert your {Men} Man and spot an unbound companion bearing 3 or more cards to return each Free Peoples card that companion bears to its owner’s hand. The Free Peoples player may add a burden to discard those cards instead.

card.name: ·Mûmak Commander, Giant Among the Swertings
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Mûmak Commander twice to exert a companion twice (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: ·Primitive Savage
card.text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, if he bears a hand weapon, you may take control of a site.

card.name: Pursuing Horde
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} Man. Bearer must be a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Limit 1 per companion. Each time the fellowship moves, add {1}.

card.name: Rapid Reload
card.text: While you can spot a {Men} Man, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site in the current region. Archery: Spot a {Men} Man and remove {3} to exert an unbound companion.

card.name: Rapt Hillman
card.text: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free People’s player may liberate a site. You may spot 3 Men to prevent this. Maneuver: Spot another {Men} Man and exert this minion to take control of a site.

card.name: Ravaging Wild Man
card.text: While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 {Men} Men to discard a follower.

card.name: Savage Southron
card.text: Maneuver: If the Free People’s player has at least 1 site in his or her adventure deck, exert 2 {Men} Men to randomly choose a site from that deck. Replace the fellowship’s current site with that site.

card.name: Swarthy Hillman
card.text: While you control a site, this minion is an archer.

card.name: Wandering Hillman
card.text: To play, spot a {Men} Man. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3. Maneuver: Remove 2 burdens or 2 threats to control a site.

card.name: Battlefield Recruit
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +2.

card.name: Battlefield Veteran
card.text: Skirmish: Discard this minion to make a minion strength +1.

card.name: Beasts of Burden
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Orc} minions. At the start of your Shadow phase, you may discard an {Orc} condition from play to play an {Orc} minion. It is twilight cost -2 (or -4 if you can spot 6 or more companions).

card.name: ·Black Gate Sentry
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Black Land Chieftain
card.text: To play, spot an {Orc} minion. When you play Black Land Chieftain, you may add a threat for each Free Peoples possession and each Free Peoples artifact you can spot.

card.name: Black Land Commander
card.text: While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +5. Skirmish: Remove 2 threats to make a character skirmishing this minion strength -2.

card.name: Black Land Observer
card.text: When you play this minion, you may spot an {Orc} condition to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Black Land Overlord
card.text: Maneuver: Remove a threat and spot another {Orc} minion to exert an unbound companion.

card.name: Black Land Runner
card.text: To play, spot an {Orc} Orc. While you can spot more sites on the adventure path than minions, this minion is strength +5.

card.name: ·Black Land Shrieker
card.text: To play, spot an {Orc} condition. Black Land Shrieker is twilight cost -1 for each threat you spot.

card.name: Black Land Spy
card.text: When you play this minion, you may spot an {Orc} possession to add a threat. While you can spot a companion of strength 13 or more, this minion is strength +7.

card.name: Coordinated Effort
card.text: To play, spot 2 {Orc} minions. Each time the Free Peoples player plays a possession, add {2}.

card.name: Desolation Orc
card.text: To play, spot 3 Free Peoples cultures or discard 2 {Orc} conditions from play.

card.name: ·Destructive Orc
card.text: When you play Destructive Orc, you may discard a fortification for each {Orc} possession and each {Orc} artifact you can spot.

card.name: ·Gorbag, Filthy Rebel
card.text: Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) When you play Gorbag, you may discard a card from the top of the Free Peoples player’s deck for each hunter character you can spot.

card.name: Isengard Marauder
card.text: To play, discard 3 cards from your hand. While you can spot 2 other {Orc} minions, this minion is fierce.

card.name: Moria Menace
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to make the Free Peoples player shuffle his or her draw deck and reveal the top card of that draw deck. Make this minion strength +X, where X is the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.name: Mountain-troll
card.text: When you play this minion, you may discard 5 {Orc} minions from play to make it twilight cost -10 and fierce. Shadow: Remove {3} to play an {Orc} Orc from your discard pile. Its twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Orkish Camp
card.text: While you can spot a {Orc} Orc, the Free Peoples player cannot replace the fellowship’s current site. Shadow: Exert an {Orc} minion and remove {2} to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is an {Orc} Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.

card.name: Orkish Hunting Spear
card.text: Bearer must be an {Orc} Orc. Bearer gains hunter X (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +X.), where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you can spot.

card.name: ·Pummeling Blow
card.text: To play, exert an {Orc} minion. Plays on the fellowship’s current site. This site cannot be replaced. While the fellowship is at this site, each Troll is strength +1.

card.name: Scouting Orc
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Tower Troll
card.text: For each companion over 5, this minion is damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion twice to assign it to a companion (except the Ring-bearer). If you cannot spot 6 companions, the Free Peoples player may exert a companion to prevent this.

card.name: ·Unmistakable Omen
card.text: While you can spot a threat, the site number of each {Orc} Orc is -1. Regroup: Remove 3 threats and discard 3 {Orc} Orcs from play to make the Free Peoples player spot a companion and place that companion in the dead pile. Discard this condition.

card.name: Unreasonable Choice
card.text: Spot 2 {Orc} minions to discard a Free Peoples condition. The Free Peoples player may add {2} for each Free Peoples condition you can spot to prevent that.

card.name: Veteran War Chief
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a companion it is skirmishing.

card.name: Brilliant Light
card.text: Make a {Rohan} companion strength +2 (or +3 and damage +1 if he or she is a hunter companion).

card.name: Burial Mounds
card.text: Make a {Rohan} companion defender +1 and minions skirmishing that companion cannot take wounds during a skirmish involving that companion until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Éomer, Horsemaster
card.text: Valiant. Hunter 2. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, Éomer’s twilight cost is -1. Skirmish: Discard a {Rohan} card from hand to make Éomer strength +2.

card.name: ·Éomer's Spear, Trusty Weapon
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is Éomer and he is unwounded, he is damage +1 and resistance +1. Skirmish: If bearer is Éomer, discard this possession to wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Éowyn, Willing Fighter
card.text: Valiant. Response: If a hunter companion or valiant Man is about to take a wound, exert Éowyn to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Gamling, The Old
card.text: Valiant. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. While you can spot 3 hunters, Gamling is strength +3.

card.name: Grim Trophy
card.text: Make a {Rohan} Man strength +1 for each hunter you can spot (or if you can spot more valiant Men than hunters, make a {Rohan} Man strength +1 for each valiant Man you can spot).

card.name: ·Haleth, Son of Hama
card.text: While you can spot 2 mounts, Haleth is strength +2. While you can spot 3 mounts, Haleth is damage +1. While you can spot 4 Free Peoples mounts, those mounts can not be discarded by a Shadow player.

card.name: Horse of Great Stature
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make a {Rohan} Man strength +1.

card.name: Horseman of the North
card.text: While you can spot a valiant Man, this companion’s twilight cost is -1. While no opponent controls a site, this companion is strength +2.

card.name: Our Inspiration
card.text: Spot a {Rohan} Man to play a possession from your discard pile for each hunter character you can spot.

card.name: Last Days of My House
card.text: Spot 2 {Rohan} Men (or 1 hunter {Rohan} Man) to play a {Rohan} companion or a {Rohan} follower from your draw deck.

card.name: Rider's Mount
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. At the start of each skirmish involving bearer, each minion skirmishing bearer must exert.

card.name: Rohan Stable Master
card.text: Aid - {1}. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add {1} to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Bearer is considered to be mounted.

card.name: Rohan Worker
card.text: Aid - {1}. Each time you transfer this to a companion, except a {Rohan} companion, exert bearer twice. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may liberate a site.

card.name: Rohirrim Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. While bearer is skirmishing a hunter minion, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: ·Rohirrim Doorwarden
card.text: Aid - {2}. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add {2} to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a {Rohan} Man. Bearer is strength +1 for each possession he or she bears.

card.name: Rohirrim Soldier
card.text: Valiant. While you can spot a {Rohan} Man, this companion’s twilight cost is -1. This companion is strength +1 for each hunter minion you can spot.

card.name: ·Rohirrim Warrior
card.text: Valiant. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot a hunter minion (or exert 2 valiant Men) to make this companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Spear of the Mark
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. If bearer is mounted, bearer is defender +1.

card.name: Sturdy Shield
card.text: Bearer must be a {Rohan} Man. While no opponent controls a site, bearer is strength +1. Regroup: Discard this to liberate a site (or two sites if bearer is mounted).

card.name: Swift Stroke
card.text: Spot your {Rohan} Man bearing a possession to discard all possessions from one character.

card.name: Community Living
card.text: Spot a Hobbit to play a {Shire} follower from your draw deck.

card.name: ·Frodo, Weary From the Journey
card.text: Ring-bearer. Ring-bound. While skirmishing a minion of strength 8 or less, Frodo is strength +2.

card.name: Hobbit Sword
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.name: ·Hobbiton Brewer, Maker of Fine Ales
card.text: Aid - Add 2 burdens. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add 2 burdens to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot a Hobbit. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, transfer Hobbiton Brewer to your support area to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Hobbiton Farmer, Lover of Pipeweed
card.text: Aid - Add a burden. (At the start of the maneuver phase, you may add a burden to transfer this to a companion.) To play, spot 2 Hobbits. Bearer is strength +1 for each fierce minion you can spot.

card.name: ·Little Golden Flower
card.text: Each Hobbit bearing a hand weapon is vitality +1. Each Hobbit bearing a follower is resistance +1. Each unwounded Hobbit is strength +1.

card.name: ·Merry, The Tall One
card.text: While Merry bears a follower, he is strength +2. Skirmish: If Merry is skirmishing a hunter minion, add a threat to make Merry strength +2.

card.name: No Visitors
card.text: Transfer a follower from a Hobbit to your support area to cancel a skirmish involving that Hobbit.

card.name: ·Pippin, The Short One
card.text: Each {Shire} follower is twilight cost -1. Skirmish: If Pippin is skirmishing a hunter minion, exert the Ring-bearer to make Pippin strength +2.

card.name: Relaxation
card.text: Response: If a Shadow card is about to add any number of burdens, discard a {Shire} follower and this condition from play to prevent that and discard that Shadow card.

card.name: ·Sam, Innocent Traveler
card.text: Ring-bound. While Sam bears the One Ring, he is resistance -4. Maneuver: If Sam is bearing a follower, exert him to heal another Hobbit. Response: If Frodo is killed, make Sam the Ring-bearer.

card.name: Second Breakfast
card.text: Add a threat and exert your Ring-bearer to wound each non-hunter minion skirmishing your {Shire} Ring-bearer.

card.name: Advancing Horde
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each site you control.

card.name: Charging Uruk
card.text: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +3 and gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.name: Chasing Uruk
card.text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may spot 4 hunters (or Ugluk) to control a site.

card.name: Covetous Uruk
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each possession you spot.

card.name: Defensive Rush
card.text: While you can spot an {Uruk-hai} minion, the Free Peoples player cannot replace a site. At the start of each skirmish, you may remove {3} to heal an {Uruk-hai} minion (or heal an {Uruk-hai} minion twice if you control a site.)

card.name: Following Uruk
card.text: Fierce. Hunter 1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may exert a companion not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Hunting Uruk
card.text: While this minion is at a battleground site, he gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.name: ·Lurtz, Now Perfected
card.text: Damage +1. Each time Lurtz wins a skirmish, the Free People’s player must exert X companions, where X is the current region number.

card.name: ·Lurtz's Sword, Mighty Longsword
card.text: Bearer must be an {Uruk-hai} Uruk-hai. Bearer gains hunter 1 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) If bearer is Lurtz, he is fierce.

card.name: ·Mauhur, Relentless Hunter
card.text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.). Assignment: Exert Mauhur to assign him to a non-hunter character (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Merciless Berserker
card.text: Damage +1. Shadow: Exert this minion to exert X companions and add X threats, where X is the number of Free Peoples cultures you spot over 2.

card.name: ·Poised for Assault
card.text: Each time a companion loses a skirmish involving an {Uruk-hai} minion, place an {Uruk-hai} token here. Skirmish: Remove 2 {Uruk-hai} tokens from here to take control of a site.

card.name: Pursuing Uruk
card.text: Fierce. During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it gains hunter 4.

card.name: ·Searching Uruk
card.text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) Searching Uruk is strength +1 for each other {Uruk-hai} hunter you can spot.

card.name: Seeking Uruk
card.text: Fierce. Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.) During a fierce skirmish involving this minion, it is strength +1 for each hunter you can spot.

card.name: ·Sentry Uruk
card.text: To play, spot an {Uruk-hai} minion. While you can spot a fierce minion, this minion is fierce. While you can spot a hunter, this minion gains hunter 1. While you can spot a character that is damage +1, this minion is damage +1.

card.name: Tracking Uruk
card.text: Hunter 1. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +1.)

card.name: ·Ugluk, Ugly Fellow
card.text: Fierce. Hunter 3. (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +3.) At the start of each skirmish involving Ugluk, each non-hunter skirmishing Ugluk must exert.

card.name: ·Ugluk's Sword, Weapon of Command
card.text: Bearer must be an {Uruk-hai} Uruk-hai. While you control 2 or more sites, bearer can not take wounds (except during skirmish phases). If bearer is Ugluk, he is damage +1.

card.name: Uruk Cavern Striker
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Spot a Free Peoples player’s site on the adventure path and exert this minion twice to exchange the spotted site with a site you control. You now control the spotted site.

card.name: Uruk Infantry
card.text: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 10 or more, this minion is strength +2. Regroup: Exert 4 {Uruk-hai} minions (or discard 3 {Uruk-hai} minions) to take control of a site.

card.name: Uruk Village Assassin
card.text: Damage +1. At the start of the maneuver phase, you may spot another {Uruk-hai} minion and remove 3 {Uruk-hai} tokens to take control of a site or discard a follower.

card.name: Uruk Village Rager
card.text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, take control of a site. While you control a site, this minion cannot take wounds (except during the skirmish phase).

card.name: Uruk Village Stormer
card.text: Damage +1. While you can spot a companion of strength 12 or more, this minion is strength +4. Each time a companion or ally is killed during a skirmish involving an {Uruk-hai} minion, you may take control of a site.

card.name: Violent Hurl
card.text: Make an {Uruk-hai} minion strength +2 (and damage +1 if that minion is a hunter).

card.name: ·With All Possible Speed
card.text: Each unwounded hunter {Uruk-hai} minion is strength +1. Response: If your hunter minion is about to take a wound during a skirmish, discard that minion to exert a non-hunter companion.

card.name: Later Than You Think
card.text: Remove 2 threats to play a Nazgûl. That Nazgûl is twilight cost -2 and gains hunter 2 (While skirmishing a non-hunter character, this character is strength +2.) until the start of the regroup phase.

card.name: A Shadow Fell Over Them
card.text: Each time a Nazgûl wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 Nazgûl (or a Nazgûl twice) to add a threat. Assignment: Spot a Nazgûl and remove {4} to play a Nazgûl from your discard pile.

card.name: They Feel the Precious
card.text: Response: If a Nazgûl is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, Desirous of Power
card.text: Fierce. Úlairë Attëa is strength +1 for every 3 twilight tokens you can spot.

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Eternally Threatening
card.text: Fierce. When you play Úlairë Lemenya, you may remove {1} to add a threat for each Free Peoples culture you can spot.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Fell Rider
card.text: Fierce. While you can spot 6 companions, {Ringwraith} minions cannot take wounds (except during skirmish phases). Skirmish: If this minion is mounted, exert him twice to wound a companion bearing a {Ringwraith} condition.

card.name: Anduin River
card.text: River. The fellowship archery total is -3.

card.name: Breeding Pit of Isengard
card.text: Underground. The twilight cost of the first hunter minion played each shadow phase is -2.

card.name: City Gates
card.text: When the Fellowship moves to this site, add a threat (or 2 if you can spot a hunter minion) for each companion over 4.

card.name: East Wall of Rohan
card.text: At the start of the Fellowship phase, you may exert two hunter companions to play a hunter companion from your draw deck.

card.name: Gate of Mordor
card.text: Battleground. Each time the fellowship moves to this site add {1} for each culture you can spot.

card.name: Isengard Ruined
card.text: Battleground. Each time a follower is transferred to a character, the first Shadow player may exert a companion twice.

card.name: Mount Doom
card.text: Battleground. Mountain. Underground. Until the end of the game, sites in this region cannot be replaced.

card.name: Westfold Village
card.text: Plains. Each hunter character is strength +1.
